abilities.name: Wind Erosion
abilities.effect: As long as Flygon is your Active Pokémon, discard the top card from your opponent's deck between turns.

attacks.name: Extreme Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon LV.X. This attack does 150 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
